description:
Drive: Add ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST in operations_base.cc.

BUG=none
TBR=hashimoto@chromium.org
for a simple change adding ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST.

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=149584

messages.text: hashimoto: I forget to add ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST in my previous check-in http://crrev.com/149140. This CL adds it. After trybots success, I'll commit this CL with TBRing you because this is so simple change. Thanks.

On 2012/08/02 02:31:26, hashimoto wrote:
> lgtm

BTW, ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST has no effect unless the code gets compiled by MSVC.
Basically, you don't have to care about it in chromeos/

On 2012/08/02 03:17:43, hashimoto wrote:
> On 2012/08/02 02:31:26, hashimoto wrote:
> > lgtm
> 
> BTW, ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST has no effect unless the code gets compiled
> by MSVC.
> Basically, you don't have to care about it in chromeos/

Yes, I know. But I think it'd be better to use it even in gdata code  to keep consistency. Thanks.

subject: Drive: Add ALLOW_THIS_IN_INITIALIZER_LIST in operations_base.cc.
